message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product is worth a lot to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
